info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and some embedded thunder will impact portions of central Schenectady, southeastern Fulton, southern Saratoga, northwestern Schoharie, Montgomery and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 815 PM EST... At 743 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds and some embedded thunder over Canajoharie, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Scotia, Mechanicville, Canajoharie, Fonda, Glenville, Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Fort Plain, Hagaman, Round Lake, Sharon Springs, Fort Johnson, Galway, Ames, Rotterdam Junction and East Glenville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 26 and 29. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 4c. Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
